SummaryEnglish: Known as the first real superhero in human history, "Zero" quietly disappeared after five years of fighting. Lin Jie, who had removed the status of "Zero", squatted at home and lived in a daze, but was kicked out of the house and reopened. Become a superhero, with the same original intention and a brand-new team, fight the darkness again! Let’s look at how the strongest hero retires and re-employs, guarding the light and hope!
Aliases: Hero? I Quit A Long Time Ago
Yingxiong? Wo Zao Jiu Bu Dang Le

1.SummaryEnglish: The former hero Zero (Lin Jie) was driven out of the house by his sister to find a job. He defeated the C-class wanted criminal on the road. After meeting Zhan Chen, Dong Xueer went to the scene and Lin Jie immediately ran away. Zhan Chen invited Lin Jie to become a hero. Lin Jie came to the place where the hero was registered and passed the test field. Before the written test, Lin Jie panicked.

2.SummaryEnglish: Lin Jie scored 13 points in the written test and was ridiculed by Zhan Chen, and Yan Qing was bullied by a group of D-class heroes. Lin Jie and Zhan Chen helped each other, and the appearance of "Frightening Ghost Jump" thirteen scared away the D-class heroes. Lin Jie and Zhan Chen invited Shisan to form a team to pull Yan Qing up, because Shisan was the building of the Broom Star’s Constitutional Heroes Association, and Yan Qing was also seriously injured.

3.SummaryEnglish: Lin Jie and his party were sent to stop the criminal gang's transaction. The criminal gang released a monster to deal with Lin Jie and his party. Zhan Chen used his own props to defeat the monster and there was a little girl inside. Dong Xueer visited Lin Jie and told Lin Jie and Little Girl Zhan Chen that they were experimental products of the Gene Evolution Company, and that the Gene Evolution Company had a great relationship with a senior member of the Heroes Association.
